import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import './Booking.css'; const apiuser = 'http://localhost:9999/user' const apiBooking = "http://localhost:9999/booking" export default class Booking extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.onSubmitBooking = this.onSubmitBooking.bind(this) this.state= { id: "", create_from : "", create_to : "", room_id: "" } } componentWillMount(){ const config = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token') } } console.log(localStorage.getItem('token')) // api axios นำ email มาแสดง axios.get(apiuser,config) .then( res => { console.log(res) // เซต Email มาแสดง this.setState({ id: res.data[0].id }) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } onSubmitBooking(){ const configBooking = { headers: { Authorization : localStorage.getItem('token'), 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } } const data = { user_id : this.state.id, create_from : this.state.create_from, create_to : this.state.create_to, room_id : this.state.room_id } console.log("StartBooking" , this.state.create_from) console.log("EndBooking" , this.state.create_to) console.log("room_id", this.state.room_id) console.log("user_id", this.user_id ) axios.post(apiBooking,JSON.stringify(data),configBooking) .then( res => { console.log(res) }, err => { console.log(err) } ) } render() { console.log("render Booking id: ", this.state.id) return (
this.id = e.target.value} /> this.create_from = e.target.value} />
this.create_to = e.target.value} />
{/* { e => this.email = e.target.value } */} this.room_id= e.target.value} /> {/* */}
